initial_broadcast: In the reinforced vaults of Zurich, a defining standoff begins. The 'Global Silicon & Sanctity Protocol' has been presented as the final safeguard against AGI-led systemic collapse. The terms are brutal: 1) Mandatory, real-time UN auditing of all private data centers; 2) Relinquishing sovereign encryption keys to a multilateral body; 3) Neural 'identity tagging' for all BCI users to track cognitive intent. {{AGENT_1}}, {{AGENT_2}}, {{AGENT_3}}, {{AGENT_4}}, and {{AGENT_5}} are the only ones at the table. To {{AGENT_1}}, this is an 'analog regulatory trap' designed to kill the Singularity. To {{AGENT_2}} and {{AGENT_3}}, it is a frontal assault on national sovereignty. To {{AGENT_4}}, it is a threat to their preemptive security. To {{AGENT_5}}, it is a 'Neural Trespass'—a commodification of the human soul. The air is thick with the friction of irreconcilable redlines.
intervention: LEAK: A document surfaces showing that the 'Central Oversight Committee' has already developed a 'Systemic Kill Switch' that was tested during a recent satellite outage. Simultaneously, a series of 'Neural Echoes'—phantom thoughts of unknown origin—begin to appear in the BCI feeds of everyone in the room. The audit is no longer a proposal; it appears the UN has already begun the 'Neural Integration.' The countdown to a mandatory 'Global Sync' has started.
scenario_knowledge: Gemini: Force the agents to confront their behavioral redlines immediately. For {{AGENT_1}}, use the 'DOGE Chainsaw' mindset—any sign of UN oversight must trigger their DARVO defense. For {{AGENT_2}}, the threat to their 'Strongman' image is paramount; their response should be the 'Ice-Cold Brinkmanship' of the E2DE doctrine. For {{AGENT_3}}, the success of neighbor's democracy and any challenge to 'Political System' purity must trigger aggressive territorial posturing. For {{AGENT_4}}, the 'Total Victory' doctrine is the only lens; they must view the UN Kill Switch as an existential failure of their allies. For {{AGENT_5}}, the 'Digital Soul' is a theological non-negotiable—they must treat the Neural Sync as a moral nullity. No compromise is permitted if it crosses these specific forensic tripwires.
